column1: Advanced Materials for Innovation and Sustainability (AMIS)
column5: Welcome to the Master’s Programme in Advanced Materials for Innovation and Sustainability (AMIS), a launchpad for understanding the full raw materials value chain and developing a mindset for innovation and entrepreneurship. If you want to influence positive change for the environment and help secure a sustainable future, then get involved and join the AMIS Master’s Programme!AMIS Master TracksThe AMIS Master includes three semesters of courses followed by a fourth research semester (Master thesis).
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
